name: Maruti Wagon R
description: The price of Maruti Wagon R, a 5 seater Hatchback, ranges from Rs. 5.54  - 8.50 Lakh. It is available in 12 variants, with engine options ranging from 998 to 1197 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Wagon R has an NCAP rating of 1 stars. Maruti Wagon R is available in 9 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 23.56 to 34.05 kmpl for Wagon R.
